extends Object
implements IAttributeType

      • prepareInsert

        public void prepareInsert(SQLInsert _insert,
                 Attribute _attribute,
                 Object... _values)
                   throws SQLException
        The method prepares the statement for insert the object in the database.
        Specified by:
        prepareInsert in interface IAttributeType
        Parameters:
        _insert - SQL insert statement
        _attribute - attribute which is inserted
        _values - new object value to set; values are localized and are coming from the user interface
        Throws:
        SQLException - if preparation for the insert failed

        _attribute - attribute which is updated
        _values - new object value to set; values are localized and are coming from the user interface

      • valiate4Update

        public void valiate4Update(Attribute _attribute,
                  Instance _instance,
                  Object[] _value)
                    throws EFapsException
        Method is executed on addition of an Attribute/Value pair for an Update on an Instance to validate if the value is permitted. Must throw the exception if not valid.
        Specified by:
        valiate4Update in interface IAttributeType
        Parameters:
        _attribute - the Attribute that will be updated with the _value
        _instance - Instance that will be updated
        _value - value that will be used for the update
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if not valid

      • valiate4Insert

        public void valiate4Insert(Attribute _attribute,
                  Instance _instance,
                  Object[] _value)
                    throws EFapsException
        Method is executed on addition of an Attribute/Value pair for an Insert on an Instance to validate if the value is permitted. Must throw the exception if not valid.
        The given instance is expected to be invalid, but must contain the type.
        Specified by:
        valiate4Insert in interface IAttributeType
        Parameters:
        _attribute - the Attribute that will be updated with the _value
        _instance - Instance that will be updated
        _value - value that will be used for the update
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if not valid

      • prepare

        protected void prepare(AbstractSQLInsertUpdate<?> _insertUpdate,
           Attribute _attribute,
           Object... _values)
                throws SQLException
        Parameters:
        _insertUpdate - SQL insert / update statement
        _attribute - SQL update statement
        _values - new object value to set; values are localized and are coming from the user interface
        Throws:
        SQLException - always, because the method must be overwritten

      • checkSQLColumnSize

        public void checkSQLColumnSize(Attribute _attribute,
                      int _size)
                        throws SQLException
        Checks for expected _size of SQL columns for _attribute.
        Parameters:
        _attribute - attribute to check
        _size - expected size of SQL columns
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the size of the SQL columns in _attribute is not the expected _size

      • toString4Where

        public String toString4Where(Object _value)
                      throws EFapsException
        Method is called when the value of the related attribute is used as argument in a where clause for a query. This is necessary because for the different attribute types the string representation must be generated different, e.g a datetime must be converted in an iso string etc.
        Specified by:
        toString4Where in interface IAttributeType
        Parameters:
        _value - value to be returned as a string
        Returns:
        string representation of the value
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
